bill_title: make owners of motor vehicles and shippers of goods responsible for certain overweight vehicle penalties.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make owners of motor vehicles and shippers of goods responsible for certain overweight vehicle penalties. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-22 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The driver of any vehicle and the owner of the vehicle are jointly and severally liable for the payment of any penalty provided by § 32-22-55 or 32-22-56. However, the shipper of the vehicle's load may sign an indemnity agreement provided by the driver or the owner of the vehicle indicating that the shipper assumes the liability for any penalty provided by § 32-22-55 or 32-22-56. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
